styles.body: font-family: 'Segoe UI', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); min-height: 100vh; padding: 20px;
styles.tradingCard: max-width: 1400px; margin: 0 auto; background: white; border-radius: 24px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
styles.cardHeader: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #742774 0%, #00a651 100%); color: white; padding: 2rem; position: relative; overflow: hidden;
styles.cardTitle: font-size: 2.5rem; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; position: relative; z-index: 1;
styles.cardBadges: display: flex; gap: 1rem; margin-top: 1rem; position: relative; z-index: 1;
styles.sectionTitle: color: #333; margin-bottom: 1rem; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem;
styles.agentItem: background: white; padding: 0.75rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 3px solid #742774;
styles.featureItem: display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem; color: #666;
styles.codeSection: grid-column: 1 / -1; background: #1e1e1e; color: #d4d4d4; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Monaco', monospace; position: relative;
styles.codeTabs: display: flex; background: #2d2d2d; border-bottom: 1px solid #3e3e3e; overflow-x: auto;
styles.codeTab: padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem; background: none; border: none; color: #d4d4d4; cursor: pointer; white-space: nowrap; transition: background 0.3s;
styles.actionButtons: padding: 2rem; background: #f8f9fa; display: flex; gap: 1rem; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap;
styles.btn: padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem; border: none; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s; text-decoration: none; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem;
styles.statsGrid: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr); gap: 1rem; padding: 1.5rem; background: white; border-radius: 12px; margin-bottom: 2rem;

scripts.showCode: function showCode(filename) { document.querySelectorAll('.code-content').forEach(content => { content.style.display = 'none'; }); document.querySelectorAll('.code-tab').forEach(tab => { tab.classList.remove('active'); }); const codeElement = document.getElementById('code-' + filename); if (codeElement) { codeElement.style.display = 'block'; } event.target.classList.add('active'); }
scripts.animateStats: document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { document.querySelectorAll('.stat-value').forEach((stat, index) => { stat.style.opacity = '0'; stat.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)'; setTimeout(() => { stat.style.transition = 'all 0.5s ease'; stat.style.opacity = '1'; stat.style.transform = 'translateY(0)'; }, index * 100); }); });
